item.title: Runescape window opener(no more coords)!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Do you mean using procedures and then calling them in the main loop?

[scar]Program New;

procedure whatever;//This procedure can be called on later.
begin
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
end;//always use ‘end;’ with a semicolon on procedures and functions, only use ‘end.’
//on the main loop.

begin//Starting main loop
whatever;//Calls the procedure ‘whatever’ and does what it says to.
end.//Ends the main loop.[/scar]

I think thats what you’re talking about, and you can have several procedures, and I recommend working with procedures because they make you’re script a lot more neat and easy to use.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape window opener(no more coords)!
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

[quote=“Sebo, post:7, topic:11141”]I got enter to work dont worry, =) found out how teehee lol. I don’t Know.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 27, 2006, 10:34:32 PM[/size][hr]If this helps out anyone I’ll Put this in.

[glow=red,2,300] Get Ready! [/glow]
[glow=green,2,300] Set! [/glow]
[glow=yellow,2,300] Go! [/glow]
Oh I got enter to work so… I got to edit script. one sec guys.

[scar]program RunescapeOpener;
begin
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Sebo’s RuneScape Opener BETA [1].2 //
// Have Internet In Second Place Going Down. //
// Have Address Bar on the very top near the MIDDLE. //
// Drag Crosshair on your desktop. //
// Enjoi The script. //
// Name is Sebo on Moparisthebest.com //
// If you got questions PM me, and we’ll talk //
//thanks phonny for const //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Setup on line 33-40 //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
const
username=notgonnatellyou
password=yeahright
MoveMouseSmooth(37,100);
ClickMouse(37,100, True);
Wait(250);
ClickMouse(37,100, True);
Wait(2500);
MoveMouseSmooth(317,37);
ClickMouse(317,37, True);
SendKeys(‘www.runescape.com’);
SendKeysVb(’{ENTER}’,false)
Wait(3500);
MoveMouseSmooth(764,383);
ClickMouse(764,383, True);
Wait(2500);
MoveMouseSmooth(683,378);
ClickMouse(683,378, True);
Wait(2500);
MoveMouseSmooth(346,661);
ClickMouse(346,661, True);
Wait(17000);
MoveMouseSmooth(589,492);
ClickMouse(589,492, True);
Wait(2500);

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// SETUP LINES //
// Type Username And Password Below. //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
SendKeys(‘username’);//Type Your Username Here.
Wait(1000);
MoveMouseSmooth(448,482);
SendKeysVb(’{ENTER}’,false)
Wait(150);
SendKeys(‘password’);//Type Your Password Here.
Wait(150);
MoveMouseSmooth(435,521);
ClickMouse(435,521, True);
Wait(3500);
MoveMouseSmooth(511,551);
ClickMouse(511,551, True);
Writeln(‘Thanks For using my script, give me feed back!’);
Wait(50);
Writeln(‘Email me comments at Rainb0wstixgroup@aim.com.’);
Wait(500);
SendKeys(‘Yay, Sebo is so cool!’);
SendKeysVb(’{ENTER}’,false)
end.[/scar][/quote]
more user friendly

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape window opener(no more coords)!
item.dc:creator: @Unholy Unholy
item.description:
@Unholy wrote:

Sendkeys();

  • a side note, if you ever write a script for RS you’ll want to use randoms, ie: mouse(123+(random(5)),456+(random(5)),1)

otherwise its a good job for a first time
